Name: Case created
Description: Create a case from an application

Name: Case payment failed
Description: Create a case after failed payment

Name: Case payment failed
Description: Create a case after failed payment

Name: Case created
Description: Create a case after payment success

Name: Apply for probate
Description: Solicitor begins a new application with firm and case details

Name: Grant of probate details
Description: Solicitor updates grant of probate details

Name: Complete application
Description: Solicitors reviews legal statement and confirms

Name: Mark as ready for examination
Description: Mark the case as ready for examination

Name: Examine case
Description: Move the case to the Examining state

Name: Mark as ready to issue
Description: Mark the case as ready to issue

Name: Resolve stop
Description: Resolve the stop placed on the case

Name: Select for QA
Description: Select the case for quality assurance

Name: Fail QA
Description: Fail QA and mark the case as stopped

Name: Examine case (reissue grant)
Description: Move the case to the Examining state reissue

Name: Resolve stop
Description: Resolve the stop placed on the case
